Given its high value and unique features, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12000. This special offer is tailored to recognize your potential to benefit greatly from this investment. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
